rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0001
rows.name: So you're trying to take down Metsu...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0002
rows.name:
We must. He's already sunk the Shiyan
Divine Beast. We can't just sit back and let
him destroy the whole of Alst.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0003
rows.name:
Of course we can't. But he's the Grail,
man! You can't just go up and try to
fight him all on your own.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0004
rows.name:
You can when you've got another
Grail in the party.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0005
rows.name: Mmm. Even still...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0006
rows.name:
In any case, our primary goal is to
defend Iira, and not necessarily to
bring Metsu to a grisly end.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0007
rows.name:
Perhaps we can even convince him
to end this peaceably.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0008
rows.name:
You do that. It'll be a damn sight
better than getting yourselves killed
for no good reason.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0009
rows.name: Ouch...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0010
rows.name:
Minochi here is a Blade of Marveni,
just like Metsu

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sure he knows far better about
our chances than we do.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0012
rows.name: You say he's being realistic?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0013
rows.name: I am being realistic.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0014
rows.name:
If it's Marveni saying the capital is
the target, then it has to be true.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0015
rows.name:
You still trust him, after everything
he's done?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0016
rows.name:
Whatever he does, it's for his own
benefit. You're just pawns in his
game. We all are.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0017
rows.name:
It does seem better to act upon the
information we do have rather than
move around aimlessly.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0018
rows.name:
All right. So what will you do now
Minochi?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0019
rows.name:
Now, I join your little traveling troupe.
How else am I going to keep tabs on
you?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0020
rows.name: Hah! I suppose so.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0021
rows.name:
If you're going to the capital, I assume
you're well-equipped for the desert?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0022
rows.name: Well-equipped how?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0023
rows.name:
Oh, so you were just going to go in
there and collapse from desert fever.
Fantastic.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0024
rows.name: Desert fever?!

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0025
rows.name:
An endemic disease caused by
funghi. There's no harm to Blades,
but to humans, it can be lethal.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0026
rows.name: Why haven't we heard of this?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0027
rows.name: Ah...that. I...forgot.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0028
rows.name:
Dumbass! Are you trying to get us
killed before we even find Metsu?!

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0029
rows.name: Aha ha ha...

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0030
rows.name:
Let's see to it that that doesn't
happen, shall we?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0031
rows.name:
We'll need enough medicine for Adel,
Hugo, Milt, Satahiko, and me.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0032
rows.name:
OK. We'll have to backtrack a bit,
but they should have something
back at the resistance camp.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0033
rows.name:
If we can collect the ingredients, they
should be able to make enough
antimycotics for all five of us humans.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0034
rows.name: What do we need?

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0035
rows.name:
Tawny Carrots and Nest Extract,
I believe.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0036
rows.name:
We can get the Tawny Carrots around
the Iiran grasslands.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0037
rows.name:
And to obtain the Next Extract, we
shall have to defeat Somelia Nests.

rows.label: fev11_490_175_msg0038
rows.name: OK, then. Let's get going!
